pages.title: Grey Triggerfish
pages.text: The grey triggerfish ($(o)Balistes capriscus$()) or gray triggerfish, is a ray-finned fish in the triggerfish family.$(br2)In its appearance and habits, the grey triggerfish is a typical member of the genus Balistes except for its drab, uniformly grey colouration.

pages.title: Grey Triggerfish
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★★☆☆$(br2)Always active$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: untamedwilds:chum$(br2)Number of Offspring: 4$(br2)Growth time: 6 Days
